thag4.5:1.4: I tore out my hair and beard.
thag4.5:2.4: I didn’t accept food set aside for me.
thag4.5:3.1: I did many deeds of this kind,
thag4.5:3.2: which lead to a bad destination.
thag4.5:3.3: Swept away by a great flood,
thag4.5:3.4: I went to the Buddha for refuge.
thag4.5:4.2: Behold the clear rightness of the teaching!
